hooks.command: file=$(echo "$TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.file_path // .filePath // empty') && if [ -n "$file" ] && echo "$file" | grep -qE '\.(ts|tsx)$'; then cd /Users/andrewmoore/elec-mate-merge && npx prettier --write "$file" 2>/dev/null; fi

cmd=$(echo "$TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.command // empty') && if echo "$cmd" | grep -qE '(rm -rf /|drop table|git push.*--force.*main|git reset --hard)'; then echo '{"decision": "block", "reason": "Blocked dangerous command. Ask the user first."}'; fi
